comment: * DateTimeRule is a class representing a time in a year by * a rule specified by month, day of month, day of week and * time in the day. * * @hide Only a subset of ICU is exposed in Android

variables.name: DOM
variables.comment:
* Date rule type defined by exact day of month.
     * For example, March 14.

variables.name: DOW
variables.comment:
* Date rule type defined by day of week in month.
     * For example, 2nd Sunday in March.

variables.name: DOW_GEQ_DOM
variables.comment:
* Date rule type defined by first day of week on or
     * after exact day of month.
     * For example, 1st Monday on or after March 15.

variables.name: DOW_LEQ_DOM
variables.comment:
* Date rule type defined by last day of week on or
     * before exact day of month.
     * For example, last Saturday on or before March 15.

variables.name: WALL_TIME
variables.comment: * Time rule type for local wall time.

variables.name: STANDARD_TIME
variables.comment: * Time rule type for local standard time.

variables.name: UTC_TIME
variables.comment: * Time rule type for coordinated universal time.

methods.name: public int getDateRuleType()
methods.comment: * Gets the date rule type, such as DOM * * @return The date rule type.

methods.name: public int getRuleMonth()
methods.comment:
* Gets the rule month.
     *
     * @return The rule month.

methods.name: public int getRuleDayOfMonth()
methods.comment: * Gets the rule day of month. When the date rule type * is DOW, the value is always 0. * * @return The rule day of month

methods.name: public int getRuleDayOfWeek()
methods.comment: * Gets the rule day of week. When the date rule type * is DOM, the value is always 0. * * @return The rule day of week.

methods.name: public int getRuleWeekInMonth()
methods.comment: * Gets the rule day of week ordinal number in the month. * When the date rule type is not DOW, the value is * always 0. * * @return The rule day of week ordinal number in the month.

methods.name: public int getTimeRuleType()
methods.comment: * Gets the time rule type * * @return The time rule type, either WALL_TIME or STANDARD_TIME * or UTC_TIME.

methods.name: public int getRuleMillisInDay()
methods.comment:
* Gets the rule time in the rule day.
     *
     * @return The time in the rule day in milliseconds.

methods.name: public String toString()
methods.comment: * Returns a String representation of this DateTimeRule object. * This method is used for debugging purpose only. The string representation can be changed * in future version of ICU without any notice.
